goal.en: Understand the principles of microcontroller 8051 and strengthen implementation skills through experiments
goal.ch: 了解微控制器8051原理，並透過實驗加強實作技能

content.en:
1. Introduction to Microcontroller
2. The 8051 Microcontroller
3. 8051 Addressing Modes and Instruction Set
4. Software Development Tools for 8051
5. 8051 Parallel I/O Ports
6. 8051 Interrupts and Timers/Counters
7. 8051 Serial Communication
8. 10 experiments
